title: Motorola benefits from LG’s fall, becomes third-largest US OEM in 2021
content:
For the first time, Motorola has gained the title of #3 OEM in the US for the year of 2021. The long-standing company looks to have benefitted from the sudden loss of LG, filling the void and doubling its own smartphone sales in 2021.

more…

The post Motorola benefits from LG’s fall, becomes third-largest US OEM in 2021 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Motorola looks to have come out of 2021 as the #3 smartphone manufacturer in the US, likely due to LG pulling its hat out of the ring.
